title.en: Alina Ugay named 2025 POSCO Asia Fellow
title.ko: 우가이 알리나 학생, 2025 POSCO Asia Fellow 선정

description.en: Alina Ugay has been named a 2025 POSCO Asia Fellow. Congratulations! 🎉
description.ko: 우가이 알리나 학생이 2025 POSCO Asia Fellow로 선정되었습니다. 축하드립니다! 🎉

title.en: Alina Ugai joined as a master’s student
Woojae Lee joined as an undergraduate researcher
INFORMS Presentation by Prof. Jangho Park

description.en: Prof. Jangho Park presented "Value of Data for Distributionally Robust Optimization with Phi-Divergences" in the Invited Session (OPT: Optimization Under Uncertainty) at the 2024 INFORMS Annual Meeting, Seattle WA USA.
description.ko: 박장호 교수님이 미국 시애틀에서 개최된 2024 INFORMS Annual Meeting의 초청 세션에서 (Invited Session - OPT: Optimization Under Uncertainty) "Value of Data for Distributionally Robust Optimization with Phi-Divergences" 주제로 발표를 하였습니다.

title.en: Invited Talk at The Ohio State University

description.en: Invited Speaker - Prof. Jangho Park presented "Distributionally Robust Optimization with Phi-Divergences" at the Seminar Series in the Department of Integrated Systems Engineering at The Ohio State University.
description.ko: 초청 세미나 강연 - 박장호 교수님이 오하이오 주립대학교 산업시스템공학과 세미나 시리즈에서 "Distributionally Robust Optimization with Phi-Divergences" 주제로 발표를 하였습니다.

title.en: Seobeom Jeong joined as an undergraduate researcher

description.en: The Stochastic Optimization and Learning Laboratory (SOL Lab) is now open!
description.ko: 확률기반최적화 연구실 (The Stochastic Optimization and Learning Laboratory, SOL Lab)이 개소하였습니다!
